\begin{tikzcd}
          & \tt{type} \arrow[ld] \arrow[rd] &           \\
\tt{type} &                                 & \tt{inst}
\end{tikzcd}

                      & \tt{type} &                       \\
\tt{ctype} \arrow[ru] &           & \tt{dtype} \arrow[lu]
\end{tikzcd}

// images/ctypes.png

% https://tikzcd.yichuanshen.de/#--bU+O0S3s23c52iz3pX2FccqwLfab62OgwBWSeIV1zhPDUYOxufVe-S8gaeIczbW84xcps-pm+apvpq2rIDIADsnLcry3rGkK9j+uC3ZWr2cr7gBnxAa+JzMkQ0H6rBh5DghcKjtuqELraS4iAYQA
\begin{tikzcd}
\tt{obj\{*\}} & \tt{int} \arrow["{\tt{[domain]}}"', loop, distance=2em, in=125, out=55] \arrow["{\tt{[range]}}"', loop, distance=2em, in=305, out=235] \arrow[l, "{\tt{[int]}}"']    & {\tt{int[plus,4]}} \arrow[l, "{\tt{[plus,4]}}"'] \arrow[l, "{\tt{[range]}}", bend left=49] \arrow[l, "{\tt{[domain]}}"', bend right=49] & {\tt{int[plus,4][mult,2]}} \arrow[l, "{\tt{[mult,42]}}"'] \arrow[ll, "{\tt{[domain]}}"', bend right=49] \arrow[ll, "{\tt{[range]}}", bend left=49] & {\tt{int[plus,4][mult,2][gt,42]}} \arrow[l, "{\tt{[gt,42]}}"] \arrow[lll, "{\tt{[domain]}}"', bend right=49] \arrow[llld, "{\tt{[range]}}", bend left] \\
              & \tt{bool} \arrow[lu, "{\tt{[bool]}}"] \arrow["{\tt{[domain]}}"', loop, distance=2em, in=215, out=145] \arrow["{\tt{[range]}}"', loop, distance=2em, in=305, out=235] &                                                                                                                                         &                                                                                                                                                    &                                                                                                                                                       
\end{tikzcd}

\tt{obj\{*\}} & \tt{ctype} \arrow["{\tt{[range]}}"', loop, distance=2em, in=305, out=235] \arrow["{\tt{[domain]}}"', loop, distance=2em, in=125, out=55] \arrow[l, "{\tt{[ctype]}}"'] &  & \tt{dtype} \arrow[ll, "{\tt{[range]}}", bend left] \arrow[ll, "{\tt{[domain]}}"', bend right] \arrow[ll, "{\tt{[inst]}}"'] \arrow["{\tt{[inst]}}"', loop, distance=2em, in=305, out=235]
\end{tikzcd}

// images/type-data-structure.png

\tt{obj\{*\}} & \tt{int} \arrow["{\tt{[domain]}}"', loop, distance=2em, in=125, out=55] \arrow["{\tt{[range]}}"', loop, distance=2em, in=305, out=235] \arrow[l, "{\tt{[int]}}"']    & {\tt{int[plus,4]}} \arrow[l, "{\tt{[plus,4]}}"'] \arrow[l, "{\tt{[range]}}", bend left=49] \arrow[l, "{\tt{[domain]}}"', bend right=49] & {\tt{int[plus,4][mult,2]}} \arrow[l, "{\tt{[mult,42]}}"'] \arrow[ll, "{\tt{[domain]}}"', bend right=49] \arrow[ll, "{\tt{[range]}}", bend left=49] & {\tt{int[plus,4][mult,2][gt,42]}} \arrow[l, "{\tt{[gt,42]}}"] \arrow[lll, "{\tt{[domain]}}"', bend right=49] \arrow[llld, "{\tt{[range]}}", bend left] \\
              & \tt{bool} \arrow[lu, "{\tt{[bool]}}"] \arrow["{\tt{[domain]}}"', loop, distance=2em, in=215, out=145] \arrow["{\tt{[range]}}"', loop, distance=2em, in=305, out=235] &                                                                                                                                         &                                                                                                                                                    &                                                                                                                                                       
\end{tikzcd}

\begin{tikzcd}
\tt{int} \arrow[rr, "{\tt{[plus,2]}}"] \arrow[d, "{\tt{[id]}}"', bend right]    &  & {\tt{int[plus,2]}} \arrow[rr, "{\tt{[plus,8]}}"] &  & {\tt{int[plus,2][plus,8]}} \arrow[d, "{\tt{[id]}}"', bend right] \\
\tt{int} \arrow[rrrr, "{\tt{[plus,10]}}"] \arrow[u, "{\tt{[id]}}"', bend right] &  &                                                  &  & {\tt{int[plus,10]}} \arrow[u, "{\tt{[id]}}"', bend right]       
\end{tikzcd}
